2:
Blessed be the name of Yahweh,\q both now and forevermore.


\q
3:
From the rising of the sun to its setting,\q Yahweh's name should be praised.
\q
4:
Yahweh is exalted above all nations,\q and his glory reaches above the skies.


\q
5:
Who is like Yahweh our God,\q who has his seat on high,
\q
6:
who looks down\q at the sky and at the earth?


\q
7:
He raises up the poor out of the dirt\q and lifts up the needy from the ash heap,
\q
8:
so that he may seat him with princes,\q with the princes of his people.


\q
9:
He gives a home to the barren woman of the house,\q he makes her a joyful mother of children.
\q Praise Yahweh!
